text: He muminagana! Halala mane karo na allahara nidarsanasamuha ebam sam'manita masasamuhake ebam harame kurabanira jan'ye nirdista jantuke ebam aisaba jantuke, yadera galaya kanthabharana rayeche ebam aisaba lokake yara sam'manita grha abhimukhe yacche, yara sbiya palanakartara anugraha o santusti kamana kare. Yakhana tomara eharama theke bera haye asa, takhana sikara kara. Yara pabitra masajida theke tomaderake badha pradana karechila, se'i sampradayera sutruta yena tomaderake simalanghane prarocita na kare. Satkarma o khodabhitite eke an'yera sahayya kara. Papa o simalanghanera byapare eke an'yera sahayata karo na. Allahake bhaya kara. Niscaya allaha taâ€™ala kathora sastidata.
